name: Hoaka Naivalu
story: Tane was born in Guadeloupe, a French Caribbean island. He joined the French military at 18 and later became a member of the Foreign Legion. After serving in several countries, he was transferred to the Arma 3 conflict as part of the French contingent in the INDEPENDENT faction. Tane's quiet nature may make him seem unapproachable, but he is fiercely loyal to his comrades and will do whatever it takes to protect them.
